item.title: Mindful
item.description: Mindful is a privacy-first, open-source digital wellbeing app that helps you break free from distractions— like Reels, Shorts, and NSFW content—without ads, trackers, or cloud dependencies. All your data stays on-device.

item.title: Neend
item.description: Neend is a beautifully crafted sleep app packed with 1500+ free sleep sounds, stories, guided meditations, and relaxing music - designed to help you fall asleep faster, nap smarter, and wake up refreshed. No experience needed.
